# order

**Instance Property**

The display order of input media sources.

## Declaration

```swift
var order: [Int] { get }
```

## Discussion

Provides an ordered list of [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMCharacteristicTypeIdentifier] values for [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMServiceTypeInputSource] services associated with the profile.

## Managing input source order

- **writeOrder(_:)**: Writes the display order of the media sources to the accessory.
- **delegate**: The property that handles updates to the display order.
- **canModifyOrder**: A Boolean that indicates if the display order of the input media sources can be modified.
- **HMMediaSourceDisplayOrderProfile.Delegate**: The protocol through which a delegate receives updates on the order of input media sources.
